claims: Patients with MDD showed reduced performance particularly at high n-back load and prolonged reaction times at all n-back loads compared to healthy controls (p<0.001)
Analysis of covariance within the MDD sample showed that physical fitness was associated with neural activity in right and left superior parietal lobules (p<0.05)
Whole-brain analysis of group by WM load revealed reduced neural activity in six frontoparietal clusters at medium and high WM loads in MDD patients compared to healthy controls (p<0.05)
